originalText.text: Dr Kelly is excellent! She was very informative throughout the whole process and very attentive to the chat whenever I had questions or concerns. This has been a lengthy process however she made it a lot more easier to deal with! I recommend being seen by her! She is the BEST!

text.text: Dr Kelly is excellent! She was very informative throughout the whole process and very attentive to the chat whenever I had questions or concerns. This has been a lengthy process however she made it a lot more easier to deal with! I recommend being seen by her! She is the BEST!

originalText.text: From the 1st appointment we've had with the medical staff to 6 yrs later,  our experience has been as easy and pleasurable as could be. Thank you Dr. Vitale, Jennifer Hope (former PA) & Ameeka George. God bless.

text.text: From the 1st appointment we've had with the medical staff to 6 yrs later,  our experience has been as easy and pleasurable as could be. Thank you Dr. Vitale, Jennifer Hope (former PA) & Ameeka George. God bless.

originalText.text: I was trying to make an appointment for my son on 6/29 . Unfortunately I didn't catch the name of the lady on the phone . She was looking for available appointment for me, then asked me to be on hold for few minutes. Few minutes became 15. I called from another phone and answering machine informed me that office hours are till 4:30. It was 4:35 at that moment.  So she just left me hanging on the hold forever. I waited for another 15 minutes.  No success. She probably just called it a day and left the office, while I was on hold. Great job!

originalText.text: I was very pleased with the overall assessment and recommendations given by Dr. Tyler.  She was very caring and answered all my questions thoroughly during our initial visit.

text.text: I was very pleased with the overall assessment and recommendations given by Dr. Tyler.  She was very caring and answered all my questions thoroughly during our initial visit.

originalText.text: Dr Vitale is hands down the best adolescent scoliosis doctor in NYC. His intelligent, informed, compassionate approach him in a league of his own. He saved our daughter from some real mismanagement at HSS. We trust our daughters care to him completely
